suggestions.title: Typography and Layout Design
suggestions.description: Visual Communication College's Typography and Layout Design course explores the art and science of typography and layout composition. Learn how to effectively use typefaces, hierarchy, alignment, and grid systems to create visually compelling designs. Gain hands-on experience in editorial design, branding, and digital layouts.

suggestions.title: Branding and Identity Design
suggestions.description: Innovation and Design School's Branding and Identity course explores the art of creating strong brand identities...

suggestions.title: Web Design Fundamentals
suggestions.description: Web Development L's Web Design Fundamentals course covers the essentials of web design...

topCourses.title: Game Design and Development
